EmailTemplate.description: GNS 8mb vs 20mb upgrade INFORMATIONAL for customers
EmailTemplate.name: GNS 8mb vs 20mb subscriptions
EmailTemplate.subject: GNS XLS and PRNAV Capabilities {!Account.Name} {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting Honeywell. We have attached an informational letter for your review regarding XLS and PRNAV capabilities. If you have any additional technical questions, please contact our Technical Operations Center (number provided below).
In order to receive a quote regarding pricing, please contact your local Honeywell dealer/service center for details.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Account Management Representative
602-436-6739
Fax: 602-822-7333
email: AISACCOUNTSERVICES@HONEYWELL.COM
For 24-Hour/7-Day technical support, please contact the Technical Operations Center at 855-808-6500 for within the United States and 602-365-6500 for outside the United States,Fax 1-602-365-3343, or email AeroTechSupport@honeywell.com
